title: ProThrivers Wellness Brain | Integrative Therapeutics®
description: ProThrivers Wellness Brain supports cognitive clarity.* This formulation includes Theracurmin® (bioavailable curcumin), citicoline, hericium erinaceus (also known as the lion's mane mushroom), and acetyl-L-carnitine.
cleaned_text: Vegan | Gluten Free [Log in](/account?locale=en) [View full details](/products/prothrivers-wellness-brain) Product information SUPPORTS COGNITIVE CLARITY* ProThrivers Wellness Brain supports (bioavailable curcumin), citicoline, hericium mushroom), and acetyl L-carnitine. The ProThrivers line of products has been specifically designed with the guidance of Lise Alschuler, ND, FABNO, a respected naturopath for 20 years and an expert in thriver care. Her present clinical focus is on addressing the needs of this specific population of thrivers using evidence-informed strategies. In addition, Dr. Alschuler is a thriver herself and uses her own experience to better understand their unique challengesTheracurmin® is a registered trademark of Theravalues Corporation, used under license by Schwabe North America, Inc. UPC: 871791105300 SKU: 10530 DIRECTIONS ProThrivers Wellness Brain Directions and/or DosageAdults take 2 capsules twice daily, or as recommended by a healthcare professional. WarningIf you are pregnant, nursing, have gallstones, a bile duct obstruction, or if you are taking prescription drugs, consult a healthcare professional before use. Keep out of reach of children. Safety sealed with inner seal. Do not use if seal is broken or missing. Keep tightly closed. Store at room temperature. Avoid excessive heat and direct sunlight.
